thread.title: New York Times editorial blasts Orleans D.A. office
thread.title_full: New York Times editorial blasts Orleans D.A. office - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: Written by: FOX8Live.com Staff
title: New York Times editorial blasts Orleans D.A. office
text:
NEW ORLEANS, LA (WVUE) - Criticism of the Orleans District Attorney's office gets national attention.
In a New York Times piece titled "Justice Gone Wrong in New Orleans ," the editorial board calls on D.A. Leon Cannizzaro to correct what the board calls a "culture of negligence and outright dishonesty" it says has pervaded the D.A. office for decades.
The editorial notes 36 convictions that have been overturned because of prosecutorial misconduct. Many of those cases were handled during Harry Connick's time as D.A.
We asked the D.A. office to comment on the editorial. We have not heard from the office yet.
Copyright 2015 WVUE.
